title: VetPrep Launches the Edcelerate Community: A Purpose-Built Online Hub for the Veterinary Field
description: VetPrep Launches the Edcelerate Community: A Purpose-Built Online Hub for the Veterinary Field
content:
New platform gains momentum as students, professionals, and mentors connect in a growing industry-exclusive space

WAUKESHA, Wis., Aug. 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- VetPrep, the leading veterinary board exam preparation provider, announced the rollout of the Edcelerate Community, a dedicated online platform designed exclusively for the veterinary field. With members across the animal health industry, it's a much-needed community for students, early-career professionals and mentors to engage in peer support, career exploration and mentorship.

VetPrep's Edcelerate Community bridges the transition from veterinary school to clinical practice.

Created to fill a longstanding gap in veterinary education and professional development, the Edcelerate Community offers a centralized space for connection, learning, and career-building - bridging the transition from veterinary school to clinical practice.

"This community is the foundation for something bigger, a place where future leaders in veterinary care can grow together," said Nader Qaimari, CEO of Edcetera, parent company of VetPrep. "We're creating a space that's not only needed, but will continue to support the profession long into the future."
• Peer Support: A dynamic space where veterinary students connect with peers navigating similar academic and clinical milestones - from exam preparation, such as the North American Veterinary Licensing Examination (NAVLE) to internships and rotations - fostering collaboration and shared learning.
• Mentorship: Members can engage directly with experienced veterinary professionals who offer guidance, answer questions, and provide career insight based on real-world experience, creating a valuable bridge between education and practice.
• Career Exploration: The platform features company profiles, insights into various practice types, and career development content to help users better understand the veterinary landscape and explore diverse roles across animal health.
• A Trusted, Purpose-Built Environment: Unlike general social platforms, this community is built exclusively for the animal health professionals and students, meaning every discussion, resource, and connection is relevant to the field, creating a focused and supportive space for professional growth.

Veterinary students and professionals face immense pressure at every stage, from licensing exams to career decisions. VetPrep's Edcelerate Community was created to ease that journey by offering a trusted, industry-specific space to ask questions, build connections, and access resources that truly matter.

About VetPrep

VetPrep is the leading online study platform for veterinary students preparing for the North American Veterinary Licensing Examination (NAVLE). Trusted by tens of thousands of veterinary professionals, VetPrep combines expertly crafted practice questions, detailed explanations, and proven learning tools to help students achieve board exam success. As part of the Edcetera family of brands, VetPrep is committed to supporting veterinary professionals at every stage of their academic and career journey.

About Edcetera

Edcetera is an education company on a mission to help people thrive in licensed careers. By providing industry-specific content, exam preparation, continuing education, and professional development, Edcetera supports learners across the full lifecycle of their career. With a growing portfolio of brands in healthcare, animal health, skilled trades, and beyond, Edcetera is reimagining how professionals learn, grow, and stay ahead in their fields.
summary: VetPrep, the leading veterinary board exam preparation provider, has launched the Edcelerate Community, a dedicated online platform designed exclusively for the veterinary field. The community, which includes members from across the animal health industry, offers a space for connection, learning, and career-building as part of a broader community. The platform also features personal profiles, insights into various practice types, and careers development content. VetPrep's CEO, Nader Qaimari, believes this community will continue to support the profession long into the future.
shortSummary: VetPrep has launched the Edcelerate Community, an industry-exclusive online platform for veterinary professionals, facilitating peer support, learning, and career development for the profession.

argos_summary: VetPrep has launched the Edcelerate Community, an online platform tailored for the veterinary field, aimed at connecting students, early-career professionals, and mentors. This community addresses gaps in veterinary education by providing peer support, mentorship, and career exploration resources, facilitating the transition from veterinary school to clinical practice. The platform is designed to foster collaboration and professional growth within a focused environment specific to the animal health industry.
